message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DM, cs.IR, cs.SI

Reasoning: The paper discusses the naive Bayesian classifier and its limitations, and proposes an algorithm to improve its accuracy. This falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence, which is covered by cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The paper also mentions experimental results and comparisons with decision-tree induction, which suggests a focus on data mining and information retrieval, covered by cs.DM (Data Mining) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
